name: SushiMaster-FoodDefense
description:
Welcome to the sushi master ,now you are the chef of midnight diner ! A big wave of food is coming. before the diners are impatient, by quickly eliminate diamonds to make food to service the diners. After getting the coins, you can choose to upgrade the restaurant or improve cooking skills, you are the master! Strive for the highest honor of the chef, Mickeylin 8 star's goal.

- Easy to handle, cute cartoon style.
- Get amazing objects through unlock levels, custom the game roles.
- 50 rich and challenging tower defense games;
- Powerful boss levels waiting for you to challenge!!
